title: Taylor Swift Joins The Voice As a ‘Mega Mentor’
text:
Taylor Swift. Photo: SOPA Images/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Gettty Images

Taylor Swift will lord over season 17 of The Voice. In addition to the core four mentors on the show — Kelly Clarkson, John Legend, Blake Shelton, and Gwen Stefani — Swift will serve as a “mega mentor,” which sounds essentially like she will be coaching everyone at some point, with an emphasis on their Knockout Round numbers. “Swift will be on-hand to work with all four coaches and their teams to provide feedback, suggestions, and praise as the artists prepare for their performances,” according to The Hollywood Reporter. This will be a return engagement for the Lover singer-songwriter, having previously dabbled in mega mentorship for season seven. She also dropped by to perform “ME!” with Brendon Urie at the end of season 16. Swift season continues apace.
description: Taylor Swift will join season 17 of The Voice in the role of “mega mentor,” meaning she will sort of coach everyone at some point or another.
